column1:
boptop123456789,"2021-04-03T20:28:40.977Z","As a huge Spidey fan I love this set","

This set is awesome for huge fans of Comic Book Spidey. The main thing I adore is those minifigs, Big Time Suit, Perfected Iron Spider, Classic Comic Book Spidey, and a pretty cool Homemade looking beginner suit.
column2: Plus Venom and the best Goblin to date? Recipe for one of the best selections of figs in a Spider-Man set.&nbsp
s a huge base for Spidey, an idea that&#39
column3: s been done before, and I do like the execution. But, there are some rather childish parts, the bike and skateboard aren&#39
column4: t necessary for Peter. Same with the hoop. Everything else, like the computer and the awesome Cabinets for the suits are awesome.&nbsp

column1: This set it pretty freaking cool for huge Spider-Man fans, I'
column2: d recommend it, even though it could be a little cheaper.&nbsp
